Module com.example.sudokuproject
Package com.example.sudokuproject.model

Class SudokuGameModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.sudokuproject.model.NumberGenerator
com.example.sudokuproject.model.WelcomeSudokuModel
com.example.sudokuproject.model.SudokuGameModel
public class SudokuGameModel extends WelcomeSudokuModel
SudokuGameModel extends WelcomeSudokuModel and adds functionality for validating numbers and generating suggestions for the Sudoku game. This model is responsible for validating user input, ensuring that only valid numbers are placed in the Sudoku grid, and providing suggestions when needed.
Author:
Mateo Noguera Pinto

  • Method Details

    • isValidChar

      public boolean isValidChar(char letter)
      Validates if the provided character is a valid digit for the game. A valid digit is between 1 and 6.
      Parameters:
      letter - The character to be validated.
      Returns:
      True if the character is a valid digit between 1 and 6, false otherwise.

    • isValidNumber

      public boolean isValidNumber(int number, ArrayList<Integer> colNums, ArrayList<Integer> rowNums, ArrayList<Integer> blockNums)
      Validates whether a number can be placed in the current cell by checking the numbers in the same column, row, and block.
      Parameters:
      number - The number to be validated.
      colNums - The list of numbers present in the column.
      rowNums - The list of numbers present in the row.
      blockNums - The list of numbers present in the 2x3 block.
      Returns:
      True if the number is valid, false otherwise.

    • getSuggestion

      public int getSuggestion(ArrayList<Integer> numsInCol, ArrayList<Integer> numsInRow, ArrayList<Integer> numsInBlock) throws NoSuggestionFoundException
      Provides a valid suggestion for an empty cell based on the numbers already present in the same column, row, and block.
      Parameters:
      numsInCol - The list of numbers present in the column.
      numsInRow - The list of numbers present in the row.
      numsInBlock - The list of numbers present in the 2x3 block.
      Returns:
      A valid suggestion (number) that can be placed in the empty cell.
      Throws:
      NoSuggestionFoundException - If no valid suggestion can be found.
